mapper.update:
update B_H_010
DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JH = #{jh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XLH = #{xlh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LLKLX = #{llklx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LLKBH = #{llkbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BJGZJL = #{bjgzjl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHUCRQ = #{chucrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TSN = #{tsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TSO = #{tso,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSN = #{csn,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CSO = #{cso,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update B_H_010 set DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JH = #{jh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XLH = #{xlh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LLKLX = #{llklx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LLKBH = #{llkbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BJGZJL = #{bjgzjl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHUCRQ = #{chucrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TSN = #{tsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TSO = #{tso,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSN = #{csn,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CSO = #{cso,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE B_H_010 SET (LLKLX, LLKBH, BJGZJL, CHUCRQ, TSN, TSO, CSN, CSO, WHSJ) = (SELECT #{llklx, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{llkbh, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjgzjl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHUCRQ, TSN, TSO, CSN, CSO, WHSJ FROM (SELECT CHUCRQ, TSN, TSO, CSN, CSO, WHSJ FROM B_H2_025 WHERE DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND JH = #{bjh, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND XLH = #{xlh, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY WHSJ DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) WHERE DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND JH = #{bjh, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND XLH = #{xlh, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
